title: [Feature request] Add example of finetuning the pretrained models on custom corpus
raw_output:
{'files_to_modify': ['examples/pytorch/language-modeling/run_clm.py', 'examples/pytorch/language-modeling/README.md', 'examples/README.md', 'README.md', 'examples/pytorch/text-classification/run_classification.py'], 'reasoning': '1. run_clm.py: Primary script for finetuning pretrained language models on custom corpus; modify/add to provide example.
2. language-modeling/README.md: Update to include instructions and details about finetuning example.
3. examples/README.md: Reference new finetuning example for improved navigation.
4. README.md: Main repo documentation—add a mention for discoverability of finetuning custom corpus example.
5. run_classification.py: Optionally, for users interested in finetuning on classification tasks, update or extend with an example if applicable.'}
